FederatedCredentialInit.summary: The FederatedCredentialInit dictionary represents the object passed to as the value of the federated option: that is, when creating a object representing a credential associated with a federated identify provider.

blockquote.para: The Federated Credential Management API (FedCM) supersedes the interface in favor of the interface.
The FederatedCredentialInit dictionary is not used when working with the IdentityCredential interface.
